column4: I am now logging in for the first time to a newly installed Ubuntu 10.04 on a Compaq Armada M700, is ubuntu desktop heavy stuff? I mean it takes forever to launch the indent screen, and also the desktop after authenticating.
you certainly need lubuntu or xubuntu, or debian
they do quite a lot, accessing squashfs fs, creating isolinux or syslinux boots, copying files, adjusting device mappings, etc
